医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
西奈山在纽约市率先实施 HYDROS 机器人系统手术西奈山医院使用 HYDROS 机器人系统进行了纽约市首例手术，这是一种旨在治疗良性前列腺增生 (BPH) 或前列腺肥大的尖端技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/Mount-Sinai-leads-the-way-with-first-HYDROS-Robotic-System-procedure-in-New-York-City.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/Mount-Sinai-leads-the-way-with-first-HYDROS-Robotic-System-procedure-in-New-York-City.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6594886b-5d42-45f2-8147-c733753072c1 Mon, 27 Jan 2025 11:18:46 -0500 Mount Sinai leads the way with first HYDROS Robotic System procedure in New York City
研究人员发现蛋白质聚集与细菌休眠之间的联系VIB-KU 鲁汶微生物学中心和 VIB-KU 鲁汶脑与疾病研究中心的研究人员揭示了一种涉及蛋白质聚集的机制，该机制允许细菌进入休眠状态，这种现象与感染的持续存在和挑战有关抗生素耐药性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/Researchers-discover-link- Between- Protein-aggregation-and-bacterial-dormancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/Researchers-discover-link- Between- Protein-aggregation-and-bacterial-dormancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4a8c996-e212-4e2a-b8d1-e0aa3efa18aa Mon, 27 Jan 2025 11:12:25 -0500 Researchers discover link between protein aggregation and bacterial dormancy
美国心脏协会发起改善心力衰竭护理的倡议大约有 670 万美国成年人患有心力衰竭 (HF)，预计到 2030 年患病率将超过 800 万。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/American-Heart-Association-launches-initiative-to-improve-heart-failure-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/American-Heart-Association-launches-initiative-to-improve-heart-failure-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d790a3d6-e19c-4f19-b5a3-b49449206c82 Mon, 27 Jan 2025 11:03:27 -0500 American Heart Association launches initiative to improve heart failure care
创新影响力：Jordi Labs 致力于使方法学符合 FDA 的期望News-Medical 与 Jordi Labs 讨论了其最近取得的成就、与 FDA 期望的一致性以及战略定位。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/Innovating-for-impact-Jordi-Labs-on-aligning-methodologies-with-FDA-expectation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/Innovating-for-impact-Jordi-Labs-on-aligning-methodologies-with-FDA-expectation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f24519b-7a63-492b-9860-d427a24dceaf Mon, 27 Jan 2025 09:32:00 -0500 Innovating for impact: Jordi Labs on aligning methodologies with FDA expectation
研究发现阿片类神经递质的变化与神经性厌食症有关芬兰图尔库 PET 中心进行的一项研究表明，大脑中阿片类神经递质功能的变化可能是厌食症的根源。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/Study-links-changes-in-opioid-neurotransmitters-to-anorexia-nervosa.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/Study-links-changes-in-opioid-neurotransmitters-to-anorexia-nervosa.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=70dd05dc-9a02-4a5d-b52c-4f2f471f2ff6 Mon, 27 Jan 2025 08:29:00 -0500 Study links changes in opioid neurotransmitters to anorexia nervosa
新生儿护理调查显示早产儿疼痛缓解不足很大一部分早产婴儿需要重症监护，这可能会很痛苦。但医疗保健系统未能充分缓解疼痛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/Neonatal-care-survey-shows-inadequate-pain-relief-for-premature-babies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/Neonatal-care-survey-shows-inadequate-pain-relief-for-premature-babies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d087bc7-df06-4c33-b717-f16f9233d18b Mon, 27 Jan 2025 08:25:30 -0500 Neonatal care survey shows inadequate pain relief for premature babies
全球大麻繁荣带来意想不到的心血管风险这篇综述研究了与大麻相关的心血管风险，揭示了其导致严重心脏健康问题的潜力，并为公共政策提供了信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/Global-cannabis-boom-brings-unexpected-cardioangio-risks-to-light.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/Global-cannabis-boom-brings-unexpected-cardioangio-risks-to-light.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cd2da4bd-c670-42eb-96a6-943501ff92ae Mon, 27 Jan 2025 08:22:00 -0500 Global cannabis boom brings unexpected cardiovascular risks to light
减肥手术可减少肥胖肝硬化患者的肝脏并发症克利夫兰诊所的一项研究表明，与仅接受药物治疗的患者相比，接受减肥手术的肥胖和脂肪肝相关肝硬化患者未来发生严重肝脏并发症的风险显着降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/Bariatric-surgery-reduces-liver-complications-in-obese-病人-with-cirrosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/Bariatric-surgery-reduces-liver-complications-in-obese-病人-with-cirrosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32a29317-863d-4bce-af07-797f556350a7 Mon, 27 Jan 2025 08:03:27 -0500 Bariatric surgery reduces liver complications in obese patients with cirrhosis
2025 年报告强调了令人震惊的心血管疾病统计数据根据《2025 年心脏病和中风统计：美国心脏协会美国和全球数据报告》中报告的数据，心脏病导致的死亡人数比任何其他原因都多，因为许多导致心脏病的风险因素仍在上升。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/Alarming-cardioangio-disease-statistics-highlighted-in-2025-report.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/Alarming-cardioangio-disease-statistics-highlighted-in-2025-report.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3b7a1e2-0d77-4b83-9502-c9a1a837a72c Mon, 27 Jan 2025 06:39:44 -0500 Alarming cardiovascular disease statistics highlighted in 2025 report
An Armand a Leg：“Shkreli 奖”——表彰医疗保健领域的功能障碍和暴利行为每年，一个名为洛恩研究所的医疗保健智囊团都会对医疗保健领域“牟取暴利和功能失调”的 10 个最严重例子进行排名，并对获胜者进行“表彰”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/An-Armand-a-Leg-The-e28098Shkreli-Awardse28099-e28094-for-dysfunction-and-profiteering-in-health-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/An-Armand-a-Leg-The-e28098Shkreli-Awardse28099-e28094-for-dysfunction-and-profiteering-in-health-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8211d684-5c98-4bd2-9428-106a7afdbf65 Mon, 27 Jan 2025 06:18:34 -0500 An Armand a Leg: The ‘Shkreli Awards’ — for dysfunction and profiteering in health care
